LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.label: medical tend speed
LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.description: Speed at which the character tends to wounds and illnesses.
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.label: medical tend quality
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.description: The base quality of tending given when tending wounds and illnesses. The actual tend quality will also be affected by factors like medicine used, facilities, room cleanliness, luck, and so on.
LanguageData.MedicalOperationSpeed.label: medical operation speed
LanguageData.MedicalOperationSpeed.description: The speed at which the character performs medical operations.
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.label: medical surgery success chance
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.description: The base chance that a character will succeed when performing a medical operation. The actual success chance is also affected by factors like facilities, room cleanliness, medicine used, the difficulty of the surgery, and inspirations. No matter how high the success chance, there is always a small chance of failure on any operation.
